name: Shadelock
immunities: psychic; bludgeoning, piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Aura of Gloom
traits.desc: When not subjected to full daylight or its magical equivalent, shadelockes have advantage on all Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The shadelocke’s spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The shadelocke can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: chill touch, detect thoughts, mage hand, minor illusion * 3/day each: blink, darkness, major image * 1/day each: dominate person, fly, true seeing

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The shadelocke makes two shadow touch attacks.

actions.name: Shadow Touch
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 22 (4d8+4) cold damage.
